detail_desc: Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif. Lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cropped, off-the-shoulder top in soft jersey with a concealed silicone trim and short sleeves. Overlocked edge around the top, sleeves and hem.
Twill coat with a stand-up collar, zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, diagonal front pockets, two inner pockets and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Cotton poplin shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket.

Ankle-length trousers in a linen and viscose weave with a high waist, pleats at the front, elastication at the back and a zip fly and buttons. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight, wide legs.
Pyjamas with a shirt and shorts in satin with piped trims. Shirt with rounded notch lapels and buttons down the front. Shorts with covered elastication at the waist.

Blouse in satin with a round neckline at the top, cut-out section with an opening and concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the top of the front, and sweetheart neckline below with a gathered seam. Long puff sleeves with gathered seams to the cuffs for a draped effect.
Bucket hat in woven fabric with eyelets at the sides and a cotton lining.
Short T-shirt dress in cotton jersey with smocking and decorative lacing at the waist. Unlined.
Leggings in sturdy jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist and a glitter print.
Plastic water bottle with a shimmering metallic print. Non-drip lid, straw and handle at the top. Capacity 600 ml.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a round neck. Buttons down the front, long sleeves, ribbing around the cuffs and hem and short slits at the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with worn details and sequins. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow, raw-edge, frayed hems.
Top in soft jersey made from a cotton and modal blend decorated at the top with shimmering plastic beads. Narrow ribbing around the neckline and long sleeves with a frill trim at the cuffs.
Hipster briefs in lace and microfibre with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Chinos in an airy cotton weave with a zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Calf-length skirt in airy, crinkled cotton with an elasticated waist and side pockets. Inner skirt in viscose.
Dress in woven cotton with a collar, button placket and a chest pocket. Long sleeves with a tab and button, a gathered yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Detachable imitation suede belt. Unlined.
Blouse in softly draping silk with a small stand-up collar and concealed buttons down the front. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Knee-length jersey dress with a concealed zip at the back and half-length puff sleeves with embroidery.
Fully lined bikini bottoms in scuba fabric with a low waist.
Straight-style T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline.
Jersey dress with a motif, long sleeves, a seam at the hip and gathered skirt.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist, high-cut legs and cutaway coverage at the back.
Briefs in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Shaftless socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a button placket, two chest pockets with decorative studs, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Gently fitted, single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with peak lapels and a single button at the front. Welt front pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Calf-length skirt in a pleated weave. High waist with covered elastication.
Long-sleeved dress in cotton jersey with a text print, a seam at the hips and flared skirt.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, jersey-lined, wrapover hood and ribbing at the cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Non-padded bras in lace with underwired, mesh-lined cups that shape the bust and provide extra-firm support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets, and an adjustable tab with buttons at the sides. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist and a zip fly and button.
A pair of long metal earrings with a hoop and rod-shaped pendants. Length 6 cm. Diameter 2.5 cm.

Sleeveless playsuit in soft cotton jersey. Elastication at the top and a flounce at the front that continues over one shoulder and a shoulder strap on the other shoulder. Elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative, tasselled bow at the front, and side pockets. Unlined.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Leggings in sturdy cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and a motif. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Soft backpack in grained imitation leather with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a handle and drawstring at the top and a flap with a magnetic fastener. Unlined. Size 15x29x35 cm.

Shirt jacket in a cotton weave with a lined, drawstring hood and long sleeves in sweatshirt fabric. Buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, a yoke at the back and ribbing at the cuffs.
T-shirt in soft jersey with an interactive motif on the front.
Oversized top in soft sweatshirt fabric. Relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders, extra-long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Short dress in an airy viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Relaxed fit with gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with a tab and button. Seam with a drawstring at the waist and a wide, softly draping skirt. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Pyjamas in soft jersey made from a cotton blend. Top with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and trims around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with covered elastication at the waist and cuffed hems.
Cap in cotton twill with an adjustable metal fastening at the back.

Fully lined shaping swimsuit that has a sculpting effect on the tummy, back and seat. Wrapover top, lightly padded cups, side support, decorative gathers in the sides, and wide adjustable shoulder straps.
Short, wide T-shirt in jersey with a motif on the front.
Vest tops in printed cotton jersey.

Short yoga top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with a V-neck and long, ribbed sleeves. Sewn-in wrapover a the front and a wrapover with an open section at the back. Seam and long ties at the hem.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a V-neck, low dropped shoulders and roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood. Deep V-neck with lacing at the front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.

Shirt in a sturdy weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, flap chest pockets with a button, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Straight-style jumper in a textured-knit cotton blend with a small stand-up collar, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.

Down jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim, small stand-up collar and a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Welt side pockets and elasticated cuffs. Filling 80% down, 20% feathers.
Short, thin metal chain necklace with a bar-shaped bead. Adjustable length approx. 42-50 cm.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Short dress in woven fabric with embroidered details. Deep, wrapover V-neck with a scalloped edge, and wide sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. Seam with narrow, concealed elastication at the waist and a flared, gently bell-shaped skirt. Lined.

Checked suit trousers in a stretch weave with an extended waistband with hook-and-eye fasteners, and a zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, and jetted back pockets with a button. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waistband, side pockets and rounded hems. Contrasting colour stripes and trims at the sides and hems.
Short coat in sturdy faux fur with a large collar, a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front and discreet pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Collarless jacket in a stretch viscose weave with a gently tapered waist, single hook-and-eye fastening and welt front pockets. Lined.
Set with a top, trousers and hat in cotton. Long-sleeved top with a concealed button on one shoulder. Trousers with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems. Double-layered jersey hat.

Long dress in airy, patterned, lightly crinkled chiffon with a narrow stand-up collar, buttons at the top and long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a skirt with a flounce at the hem. V-neck, jersey inner dress with narrow adjustable shoulder straps.
Playsuit in sequin-embroidered mesh with a round neckline and deep opening at the back with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist. Lined.
Knee-length sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, and a key pocket in the waistband. Unlined.
Dress in a soft, checked cotton weave with a lace-trimmed collar and buttons at the top. Short, lace-trimmed sleeves, a gathered seam at the waist and patch front pockets with lace details. Unlined.
Short, sleeveless dress in an airy weave with a V-neck at the back and ties at the back of the neck. Pleats at the front and a box pleat at the back. Lined.
Blouse in soft, washed Tencel™ lyocell denim with a collar, buttons down the front and short, voluminous puff sleeves with narrow cuffs and covered buttons.

prod_name: ED HW Pink barell leg denim
detail_desc: 5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed cotton denim. Relaxed fit with a high waist, zip fly and button, and tapered legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in stretch cotton jersey with a collar and button placket. Slim fit.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a regular waist and flared legs. Wide waistband with a concealed key pocket.
T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with a round neck and straight-cut hem.
Short shorts in a viscose crêpe weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and decorative lace trims at the front and hems.
Braided imitation leather waist belt with elastic at the back and a metal clasp at the front. Width approx. 6 cm.
Short dress in textured jersey with short sleeves with an opening and a tie. Unlined.
Sports tights in cotton jersey with wide elastication at the waist.
